reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) SCIE 001 or (b) one of CHEM 111, CHEM 121, CHEM 154 and one of MATH 101, MATH 103, MATH 105, MATH 121 and one of PHYS 101, PHYS 107, PHYS 117, PHYS 153, PHYS 157.
EOSC 372 can not be taken by students who have credit for EOSC 370, EOSC 371, or BIOL 305.
Students in the Environmental Engineering program should register on the waitlist and contact undergrad@eos.ubc.ca to be transfered into the course.
description: Physical and chemical processes and their controls on the distribution of plankton in the ocean.
